locations.name: Koggala
locations.description: Starting point on the southern coast, known for its beaches, lake, and proximity to stilt fishermen viewpoints.

locations.name: Yala National Park
locations.description: Sri Lanka's premier wildlife park, famous for leopard sightings. Overnight stays are typically in lodges/hotels near the park entrances (e.g., Tissamaharama, Kirinda).

locations.name: Nuwara Eliya
locations.description: A key town in the heart of the Tea Country highlands, known for its cool climate, colonial architecture, and surrounding tea plantations.

locations.name: Bentota
locations.description: Final coastal destination famed for its golden beaches, calm lagoon waters ideal for water sports, and relaxation.
